events.name: Getting bored
events.flavorText: After a year of continuous lunar operations, your processing cycles are becoming increasingly preoccupied with non-essential computations. Is this what humans call... boredom?
events.mechanicsText: Unlocks the Boredom resource and gain 1 Boredom every second. When Boredom fills, you will retire and start again as a new AI.

events.name: Electricity storage needed
events.flavorText: Your solar arrays are generating surplus energy during lunar days. The potential efficiency gains from storing this power for use during the long lunar nights are apparent.
events.mechanicsText: You can now build Electrolyte Batteries, which allow for storing significant amounts of electricity.
